string.value:
=Hey {{ $('Code6').item.json.lead_details.first_name }}, here's what you need to know before you meet us.

1. CMA has only *2 exams* which you pass in the next *9-12 months*

2. As a Miles CMA alumni, you'll have *jobs with MNCs in India* 

3. _#CMAmatlabMiles_ - Miles is the *world's largest CMA course provider* (with majority of its student base in India)
